strategy.platform_optimization: Instagram (primary focus, but with considerations for TikTok and general discoverability)
strategy.trend_analysis: Incorporates trending educational tags (#EduTok, #MathTok, #LearnOnTikTok) and seasonal relevance (#BackToSchool). Also leverages broader discovery tags and niche mathematical concepts. The 'meme education' and 'animation' tags are included to capture interest based on the comedic and visual style.
strategy.engagement_strategy: Uses call-to-action style hashtags like #ExplainLikeImFive and #AskADragon to encourage interaction and community building. #MathChallenge invites active participation from viewers. The primary and niche tags attract a targeted audience seeking specific knowledge.

usage_tips: For Instagram: Mix a variety of hashtag sizes (primary, niche, broad) within the caption. Place less crucial hashtags in the first comment to maintain caption cleanliness.
For Reels: Utilize trending audio and visually engaging effects alongside these hashtags. Prioritize the most relevant trending and primary tags.
For TikTok: Focus heavily on #EduTok, #MathTok, #LearnOnTikTok, and any currently trending audio/challenge hashtags. Keep descriptions concise.
For YouTube: Integrate primary and niche hashtags into the video title and description for SEO, and use a broader set in the dedicated hashtag section.
Monitor performance: Track which hashtags drive the most views and engagement, and adjust your strategy for future posts.

generation_metadata.topic: EPISODE 12: Dragon's Crystal Ball!! Show this as HUGE ANIMATED TITLE CARD at the beginning for 3 seconds with epic effects! Create a Family Guy style comedy where fortune teller dragon teaches Taylor polynomials and series. Cover linear and quadratic approximations, Taylor's theorem, remainder estimates, famous series for exponential, trigonometric and logarithmic functions, and the proof that e is irrational. Use visual metaphors: crystal ball predictions, increasing precision, shrinking errors. Make power series accessible and magical.
